description: Contributed to miiflow-llm, working closely with the Miiflow team to build a lightweight agentic library that sits between heavyweight frameworks (LangChain/LlamaIndex) and thin SDKs.
keyContributions: Co-designed the provider-agnostic API architecture supporting OpenAI, Anthropic, Groq, Gemini, Mistral, and Ollama with unified interfaces
Contributed to the streaming reasoning + tool events system enabling real-time UI updates for every agent step
Helped architect the ReAct, Thinking, and Plan-and-Execute reasoning patterns with clean abstractions
Implemented the one-line @tool decorator system for seamless function-to-tool conversion
Collaborated on establishing the library's core principle: lightweight but agentic, giving developers full control without framework lock-in
footer: The library is now used in production at Miiflow and has been adopted by external teams building agentic systems.

description: Contributing to the industry-standard framework for evaluating language models, used by researchers and organizations worldwide for benchmarking LLMs.
bullets: Fixed critical bug in model_args processing (PR #3097) - handled both string and dictionary formats, preventing visualization errors
Integrated chrF (character n-gram F-score) metrics for better evaluation of machine translation and text generation tasks
Added comprehensive test cases to ensure robust handling of different input formats

description: Contributing to HuggingFace's vision-language model training framework.
bullets: Integrated new evaluation metrics for vision-language tasks
Implemented GRPO (Group Relative Policy Optimization) training techniques
Enhanced model training pipelines and benchmarking capabilities

description: Contributing to Pickle's enterprise knowledge management platform.
bullets: Built real-time search functionality (PR #150) enabling users to search across conversation history and audio transcripts
Implemented multi-source search with keyword highlighting and direct navigation to session details
Created search-as-you-type experience across both AI messages and transcripts

description: Contributed to AI-powered note-taking and summarization tool, with focus on audio processing.
bullets: Worked on speaker diarization implementation to identify and separate different speakers in audio recordings
Addressed silent response detection issues in audio processing pipeline
Research transitioned to DOVER (Diarization Output Voting Error Reduction) model for improved diarization accuracy
